NPC_Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>All right, I'm outta here.


<sp:3:0:2:0101>If our paths ever do cross again, you
should buy some fish off me!<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_00>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>this isn't the time to play the
peddler, huh?<sp:5:1:0>

Anyway, thanks again, and so long!
NPC_Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_00>It really worked...<sp:5:0:0> I knew it was a long
shot, but it was worth it!

<sp:3:0:2:0301>After what went down in Lurelin Village,<sp:5:0:0>
I couldn't exactly refresh my stock of fish,
so I went out to try to catch my own.
That's when a storm kicked up. <sp:5:0:0>I tried to
shelter in this cave, but got shut in.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Yeah, things were pretty bad for a while,
but look at me now!<sp:5:0:0> That bottle really
turned things around!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If this lucky streak keeps up, it's gotta
bode well for business!
NPC_Talk_0009_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Which kinda raises the question...<sp:5:0:0>
How did you get in here?
NPC_Talk_0003_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>I really owe ya.<sp:5:0:0> A little reward's the least
I can do!
NPC_Talk_0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wh-whoa! Who are you?!<sp:5:0:0> You know what?
I don't care!

If you're here, then I'm saved! <sp:5:0:0>Ugh, I've
been stuck in here for ages!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Did you...<sp:5:0:0>find my message in a bottle and
come to rescue me?
NPC_Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You didn't even see my message?<sp:5:0:0>
No, of course you didn't...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>I put my hopes and dreams into that little
bottle...<sp:5:0:0>but I guess they're all sunk.

First there's the attack on Lurelin Village,<sp:5:0:0>
which meant I couldn't restock my supply
of fish...
Then I go out to fish up my own, but the
only thing I catch is a storm. <sp:5:0:0>So I go take
shelter in this cave, and BOOM, I'm stuck.
<snd:Sad_00>Now you tell me that my letter—my ONE
shot at getting out of here—never found a
reader?<sp:5:0:0> It's just one thing after another...
...<sp:5:1:0>Huh.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice_01>Wait, hold on.<sp:5:1:0> The whole point of the
letter was to get someone to come help
me. You're someone... You can help me!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Maybe my luck's finally turning around!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Yeah! <sp:5:0:0>Yeah, it has to be!<sp:5:0:0> That's gotta
bode well for business.
NPC_Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was saved...


But I'm not going anywhere with that rock
in my way.
NPC_Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Notice_01>But, uh...<sp:5:1:0> It looks like the rock's still
blocking the exit there.

I thought I could finally get out too...<sp:5:0:0>
Guess I started celebrating a bit too early.
NPC_Talk_0011_0:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hold on! <sp:5:0:0>How long has the entrance
been unblocked?
NPC_Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Did...<sp:5:0:0>did you move the rock for me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Then that means...<sp:5:1:0>I can finally get outta
here!<sp:5:1:0> Oh! I've gotta thank you!
NPC_Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Here, this is for you!<sp:5:0:0> I picked it up off the
ground here in the cave.

That sounded better in my head. It's a
nice reward, honest! I was planning to
take it home with me once I got out.
